DOCNAME: CASE OF ŽÁKOVÁ v. THE CZECH REPUBLIC
CONCLUSION: Pecuniary and non-pecuniary damage - award (Article 41 - Non-pecuniary damage;Pecuniary damage;Just satisfaction)
JUDGES: Aleš Pejchal;Kristina Pardalos;Ledi Bianku;Linos-Alexandre Sicilianos;Pauliine Koskelo;Robert Spano
TEXT: CARDINAL . On DATE Týden.cz , an internet news portal , published an article with the headline “ A ‘ European’ dispute . She escaped communism and lost her property . GPE reluctant to compensate her ” ( “ ‘ ORG . Utekla před komunisty a přišla o majetek . ČR ji nechce odškodnit ” ) . The journalist introduced the applicant ’s case by saying that she had been struggling against ORG for DATE because her land had been confiscated following her escape . Up to DATE , she had repeatedly won her case before ORG . However , the issue of her compensation had become more complicated . The article contained the following statement :

“ An appeal to ORG did not help either . So she applied to ORG , which noted ‘ ORG is struck by the fact that in DATE the municipality of GPE was able to take possession of the property on the basis of a DATE judgment that had been quashed because , in the words of LAW , it was incompatible with the principles of a democratic society’ .

Eventually , GPE applied for a review of the judgment , which is the equivalent of an appeal , but was unsuccessful . Since then , complicated negotiations as to how the Government would compensate PERSON have been underway . ‘ I approached the Government Agent with a proposal for settlement regarding the provision of just satisfaction , which among other things is for pecuniary damage because there had been an interference with her property PERSON stated PERSON ’s lawyer [ PERSON ] , adding that she had been deprived of her property in DATE in breach of LAW to ORG .

‘ That ’s why I suggested providing her with compensation in the amount of the market value of the seized property and compensation for the loss of rent since CARDINAL , [ FAC ] said . But in fact , PERSON was willing , according to him , to accept CARDINAL of the market rent .

However , the ORG refused [ this proposal ] , noting that the Government were prepared to accept only compensation for the plots of land in the amount of their market value in DATE . Thus , it would be essentially lower than the current value ; moreover , such compensation would not include reparation for the period when PERSON had been unable to dispose of the land . ‘ I confess that the ORG ’s approach in this regard seems to me at least dishonest and contravenes the basic principles of justice and our law , too,’ added lawyer [ ORG ] . The Agent of the ORG , or more precisely , ORG for which he works , has refused to comment as the negotiations , according to him , are confidential . ”
CARDINAL . The original version of the article is as follows :

“ ORG stížnost k Ústavnímu soudu . Obrátila se proto na ORG soud pro lidská práva . ‘ ORG dvůr je udiven skutečností , PERSON DATE byla obec ORG schopna zmocnit se majetku na základě rozsudku z roku DATE , který CARDINAL zrušen , protože byl podle zákona o soudní rehabilitaci neslučitelný s principy demokratické společnosti,’ konstatoval soud .

PERSON republika nakonec podala k soudu žádost o přezkoumání rozsudku , což je obdoba odvolání , ale bezúspěšně . Od té doby probíhají složitá jednání o tom , jakým způsobem vláda paní PERSON odškodní . ‘ Obrátil jsem se na vládního zmocněnce s návrhem dohody ohledně poskytnutí přiměřeného zadostiučinění , které mimo jiné spočívá ve způsobení majetkové škody , neboť došlo k zásahu do jejích majetkových práv,’ konstatoval advokát ORG [ GPE ] s tím , že její majetek jí ORG DATE odňat v rozporu s LOC protokolem PERSON o lidských právech .

‘ Proto jsem navrhl , ORG jí byla poskytnuta náhrada ve výši tržní ceny odňatého majetku a náhrada za ušlý nájem za dobu od roku DATE do PERSON řekl [ PERSON ] PERSON přitom podle jeho slov ochotná přistoupit na desetinu tržního nájemného .

To však stát odmítl s tím , PERSON ochotná přistoupit pouze na náhradu pozemků ve výši jejich tržní ceny v roce DATE . Tedy podstatně nižší než nyní , navíc by tato náhrada neobsahovala odškodnění za dobu , ORG s PERSON nemohla disponovat . ‘ ORG , že postoj vlády mi v tomto ohledu připadá mírně řečeno neseriózní a je v rozporu se základními zásady spravedlnosti QUANTITY GPE dodal advokát [ ORG ] . PERSON státu , respektive ministerstvo spravedlnosti , pro které pracuje , se k tomu odmítl vyjádřit , protože jsou podle něj tato jednání důvěrná . ”
